column6: One versus many! What happens when a Wolverine who's found peace is confronted with wave after wave of feral Wolverine? Bring a poncho! The Deadpool of 1872 is looking for a new ride! Say, Devil Dinosaur looks like a mighty fine steed... See the tremendously tiny tussle of the Ant-Men of Battleworld! If you only read one Secret Wars anthology, MAKE IT THIS ONE! If you read two...BUY TWO COPIES! Secret Wars Journal won't love you like we do.
column8: | writer:Ivan Brandon | writer:Ryan Ferrier | artist:Aaron Conley | artist:Logan Faerber | artist:Paul Pope | penciller (cover):Scott Hepburn
